verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688> of Asaph <WH623>. O 'Elohim <WH430>, why hast thou cast us off <WH2186> <WH8804> for ever <WH5331>? why doth thine anger <WH639> smoke <WH6225> <WH8799> against the sheep <WH6629> of thy pasture <WH4830> ?

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> thy congregation <WH5712>, which thou hast purchased <WH7069> <WH8804> of old <WH6924>; the rod <WH7626> of thine inheritance <WH5159>, which thou hast redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804>; this mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726>, wherein thou hast dwelt <WH7931> <WH8804>.
Lift up <WH7311> <WH8685> thy feet <WH6471> unto the perpetual <WH5331> desolations <WH4876>; even all that the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> hath done wickedly <WH7489> <WH8689> in the sanctuary <WH6944>.
Thine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802> roar <WH7580> <WH8804> in the midst <WH7130> of thy congregations <WH4150>; they set up <WH7760> <WH8804> their ensigns <WH226> for signs <WH226>.
A man was famous <WH3045> <WH8735> according as he had lifted up <WH935> <WH8688> <WH4605> axes <WH7134> upon the thick <WH5442> trees <WH6086>.
But now they break down <WH1986> <WH8799> the carved work <WH6603> thereof at once <WH3162> with axes <WH3781> and hammers <WH3597>.
They have cast <WH7971> <WH8765> fire <WH784> into thy sanctuary <WH4720>, they have defiled <WH2490> <WH8765> by casting down the dwelling place <WH4908> of thy name <WH8034> to the ground <WH776>.

They said <WH559> <WH8804> in their hearts <WH3820>, Let us destroy <WH3238> <WH8799> them together <WH3162>: they have burned up <WH8313> <WH8804> all the synagogues <WH4150> of 'Elohim <WH410> in the land <WH776>.
We see <WH7200> <WH8804> not our signs <WH226>: there is no more any prophet <WH5030>: neither is there among us any that knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> how long <WH5704>.
O 'Elohim <WH430>, how long shall the adversary <WH6862> reproach <WH2778> <WH8762>? shall the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> blaspheme <WH5006> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5331> ?
Why withdrawest <WH7725> <WH8686> thou thy hand <WH3027>, even thy right hand <WH3225>? pluck <WH3615> <WH8761> it out of <WH7130> thy bosom <WH2436> <WH8675> <WH2436>.
For 'Elohim <WH430> is my King <WH4428> of old <WH6924>, working <WH6466> <WH8802> salvation <WH3444> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth <WH776>.
Thou didst divide <WH6565> <WH8782> the sea <WH3220> by thy strength <WH5797>: thou brakest <WH7665> <WH8765> the heads <WH7218> of the dragons <WH8577> in the waters <WH4325>.
Thou brakest <WH7533> <WH8765> the heads <WH7218> of leviathan <WH3882> in pieces, and gavest <WH5414> <WH8799> him to be meat <WH3978> to the people <WH5971> inhabiting the wilderness <WH6728>.
Thou didst cleave <WH1234> <WH8804> the fountain <WH4599> and the flood <WH5158>: thou driedst up <WH3001> <WH8689> mighty <WH386> rivers <WH5104>.
The day <WH3117> is thine, the night <WH3915> also is thine: thou hast prepared <WH3559> <WH8689> the light <WH3974> and the sun <WH8121>.
Thou hast set <WH5324> <WH8689> all the borders <WH1367> of the earth <WH776>: thou hast made <WH3335> <WH8804> summer <WH7019> and winter <WH2779>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> this, that the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> hath reproached <WH2778> <WH8765>, O YY <WH3068>, and that the foolish <WH5036> people <WH5971> have blasphemed <WH5006> <WH8765> thy name <WH8034>.

O deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> not the soul <WH5315> of thy turtledove <WH8449> unto the multitude <WH2416> of the wicked: forget <WH7911> <WH8799> not the congregation <WH2416> of thy poor <WH6041> for ever <WH5331>.
Have respect <WH5027> <WH8685> unto the covenant <WH1285>: for the dark <WH4285> places of the earth <WH776> are full <WH4390> <WH8804> of the habitations <WH4999> of cruelty <WH2555>.
O let not the oppressed <WH1790> return <WH7725> <WH8799> ashamed <WH3637> <WH8737>: let the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34> praise <WH1984> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, plead <WH7378> <WH8798> thine own cause <WH7379>: remember <WH2142> <WH8798> how the foolish man <WH5036> reproacheth <WH2781> thee daily <WH3117>.

Forget <WH7911> <WH8799> not the voice <WH6963> of thine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>: the tumult <WH7588> of those that rise up <WH6965> <WH8801> against thee increaseht <WH5927> <WH8802> continually <WH8548>.
